      • createUrl

        public static URL createUrl(String rawUrlStr)
        Converts rawURL to a URL.
        Parameters:
        rawUrlStr - the complete raw URL (including any additional paths).
        Returns:
        a URL.
        Throws:
        UrlException - if computing the URL fails.

      • computeProtocolAndHostString

        public static String computeProtocolAndHostString(String rawUrlStr)
        Taking the rawURL, will return the URL for just the server.
        Parameters:
        rawUrlStr - The complete raw URL (including any additional paths).
        Returns:
        the server's URL including protocol.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if computing the URL fails.

      • computeHostUrl

        public static URL computeHostUrl(String rawUrlStr)
        Using rawUrlStr, convert to protocol and host version.
        Parameters:
        rawUrlStr - the raw URL to convert.
        Returns:
        a URL representation of only protocol and host.
